name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon #012: Nekh-ta-Nebi's Tomb (5E)
detailed_description:
A 5E Mini-Dungeon for 4 Level 5 PCs


This complex is set inside a small pyramid or ancient burial site, deep within the desert. It is home to the remains of Nekh-ta-Nebi, a minor nobleman whose lust for power maintains him and his dusty retinue, centuries after their unholy deaths.

5E Mini-Dungeons are small adventures for 5th Edition which are setting agnostic and are easily inserted anywhere in your campaign.

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and the included 5E Ruleset.
